description: A type for all financial value-related fields. For example, balance, payment due, and so on.
title: Money type that includes currency code qualified value

value.description: Can be anything from an integer for currencies that are not typically fractional, like JPY, to a three-place decimal fraction for currencies like TND that are subdivided into thousandths, to a currency like BitCoin that has eight decimal places. For the required number of decimal places for a currency code, see [ISO 4217](http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/currency_codes.htm).
